        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findMatching​(java.lang.String searchString)
        Find the indices of all file matching the given search string.
        Parameters:
        searchString - The string to match.
        Returns:
        The array list of indices of all matching files, or only -1 in the arraylist if no match is found.

      • findAllMatching

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> findAllMatching​(java.lang.String searchString)
        Find the set of file names of all file matching the given search string.
        Parameters:
        searchString - The string to match.
        Returns:
        The array list of indices of all matching files, or only -1 in the arraylist if no match is found.
